name: Sword of the Dead City
description:
Enjoy this interesting samurai platformer prototype!

You play as a Ronin during the feudal period of Japan. Your hometown has been overrun by evil Oni, and you are the only one that can  save it! Platform through two different linear levels as you hack and slash through 3 different enemy types! Be aware this is an unfinished and cancelled project, so there may be bugs/missing art assets.

HOW TO PLAY

Arrow Keys: Move
Z - Jump (jump against walls to wall climb)
X - Swing Sword; attack enemies until they turn grey!
X (Hold) - Hold the X button until the player starts flashing. Then release to unleash a finishing move! All enemies can only be defeated with a finishing move, which is only effective when they turn grey!
C - Dash
Left Ctrl - Slide (use to move under low clearance)
V - Teport; use the arrow keys to rotate red dotted aim, target valid enemy to teleport
